description.message: Monitor your monthly Videotron Internet quota.

needs_config.message:
Configuration needed...
Please enter your Videotron User Key
in the options.

oh_noes_error.message:
Oh Noes! There's been an error.
$DETAILED_ERROR$

data_transfer_packages.message: Extra data transfer packages bought this month

where_to_find_user_key.message: * Don't know your Videotron User Key? You can find it in your Videotron Customer Center, in the User Key tab of the Your Profile page.

over_limit_get_packages.message: Over-limit! Buy extra data transfer packages, or you'll be charged $SURCHARGE$$$ extra this month.

over_limit_too_much_tooltip.message: Over-limit! You'll pay extra this month.

used_and_quota.message: You have transfered $BW_USED$GB this month, of your $QUOTA$GB quota.

too_late.message: Even with $MAXTRANSFERPACKAGES$GB of transfer packages (the maximum), you'll still be charged $HYPOTETIC_OVERLIMIT$$$.

over_limit_tooltip.message: Over-limit! You'll probably pay extra this month.

over_limit_tip.message: To get no extra charges, you'd need to buy another $EXTRAPACKAGES$GB of extra transfer packages.

expected_over_limit_tooltip.message: At this rate, you'll be over limit at the end of the month.

expected_over_limit_tip.message: Today is the $NUM_DAYS$ day of your billing month. At this rate, you'll be at $ENDOFMONTHBANDWIDTH$GB at the end of the month.

all_is_well.message: All is well. You can download more.

needs_config_notif_text.message: Please enter your Videotron User Key in the options page of the Videotron Internet Usage Monitor extension.
